host_video.description: Start meetings with the host video on.

participant_video.description: Start meetings with the participant video on.

audio_type.description: The audio type used to join the meeting.

join_before_host.description: Enable participants to join before host.

enforce_login.description: Enable only those users who are signed in to Zoom to join the meeting.

enforce_login_with_domains.description: Only users with a specific domain can join the meetings.

enforce_login_domains.description: Specify domains for users to sign in to and join the meeting.

not_store_meeting_topic.description: Display "Zoom Meeting" as the meeting topic.

force_pmi_jbh_password.description: Require password for Personal Meetings if attendees can join before host.
